alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Livingston; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:30AM EDT until July 19 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Union County in southern Illinois... Northern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Massac County in southern Illinois... Southern Pope County in southern Illinois... Southern Johnson County in southern Illinois... North central Alexander County in southern Illinois... West central Livingston County in western Kentucky... North central Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northwestern McCracken County in western Kentucky... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 729 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Vienna to near Dongola to near Jonesboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, Brookport, Dongola, Karnak, New Columbia, Ullin, Joppa, Cypress, New Grand Chain, Belknap and Mill Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 4. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 20 and 38. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 17 and 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
